text: The Federal University of Rio de Janeiro (, UFRJ) is the largest federal university of Brazil. It has a central campus in the city of Rio de Janeiro and two smaller ones. It was established in 1792 as a military college, and became a university in 1920. It is one the country's most prestigious universities. The Federal University owns several hospitals and several museums including the National Museum of Brazil. == References == == Other websites == * UFRJ Official website Category:Federal University of Rio de Janeiro Category:Buildings and structures in Rio de Janeiro Category:1920 establishments in South America Category:1920s establishments in Brazil
title: Federal University of Rio de Janeiro
